title: Coronavirus: Here's what's happening in Canada and around the world on Saturday
description: The longest undefended border between two countries is now closed to non-essential traffic, such as tourists and people looking to do some shopping, in an effort to slow the spread of COVID-19.  The new normal at Canada-U.S. border crossings went into effect …
content: The latest ul li Border no longer open for routine casual traffic between Canada and U S li li Canadians stuck in Peru in limbo on getting help to leave the country li li Flight bringing Canadians home from Morocco is expected to land in Montreal chars
